name: Mobile bottom nav
description: Users get lost on mobile without clear actions visible at all times.  Add this and use instead of hamburger.

name: Invites & redemption
description: Optional invite onboarding via email or shareable token, with stored invite context.

name: Default provider AI methods
description: Add stronger AI generation methods to the default provider server.

name: Invite credits
description: Grant starter credits on invite acceptance; record inviter and source.

name: Likes
description: Persist likes on creations and surface them in the UI.

name: Comments
description: Persist comments on creations with UI support.

name: Provider boosts
description: Server-scoped boosts increase provider credit yield with caps, no discovery lift.

name: Credit pools
description: Ledger and UI for provider pools used in giveaways and events.

name: Notifications
description: Define notification types and wire them to real delivery.

name: Role Progression
description: Define role transition rules and whether roles can be relaxed.

name: Templates
description: Define template model, storage, and UI flow for reusable prompts.
